title: Fiskars Coastal Colors Acrylic Clear Ruler - 6" x 24" Sewing and Quilting Ruler for with Gridlines - Craft Supplies
brand: Fiskars School, Office and Craft Division
description: Fiskars large Coastal Colors Acrylic Ruler is perfectly sized for cutting strips or squares of fabric right from the bolt. It features clearly marked measurement lines and 30-, 45- and 60-degree line indicators. Made of durable acrylic.
